Local iwi | blank_info = Ngāti Ranginui, Ngāi Te Rangi, Ngāti Pūkenga | official_name = }} Tauranga (Māori pronunciation: ) is a city in New Zealand. ==Notable residents== * Simon Bridges – politician; Former Leader of the New Zealand National Party * Phil Rudd – drummer for AC/DC ==Past residents== * Les Munro – Dambusters veteran * Winston Peters – former MP for Tauranga, leader of NZ First, politician ==Sister cities== Tauranga is twinned with: * Hitachi, Japan * San Bernardino, United States * Yantai, China ==References== ==Other websites== * Tauranga City Council
